text: (Zhe shi) cong an la ji qi shizhe zai zheng zhao zhi ri chuan shizhong ren de tonggao: An la ji qi shizhe duiyu yi wu pei zhu zhe shi wugan de. Ruguo nimen huiguo, na duiyu nimen shi geng hao de, ruguo nimen beili, name, xuzhi nimen buneng taobi an la de qianze. Ni yi tongku de xingfa xiang bu xindao zhe baoxi ba
